name: Please Don't Feed the Creatures of the Deep
name_original: Please Don't Feed the Creatures of the Deep
description:
Use your trusty potato gun to feed the local wildlife.

Created in 30 days for Haunted PS1 2021 Summer of Shivers jam with optional themes of Public Service Announcement and Submechaphobia.  I tried to use both.

Please note:  There is only one ending, and you will know if you got it.  There is still quite a bit of gameplay (in the flappy bird sense) afterward, but you can see the full story with minimal effort.

I wasn't able to test this on Windows or Mac, so please let me know if you run into any issues.

CONTROLS: WASD + Mouse to move, left-click to shoot, space to jump

Credits:

Graphics and design by VaporShark

Music by VaporShark and MousyKissed: https://mousykissed.bandcamp.com/ 

PS1 shader derived from the work of MenacingMecha: https://github.com/MenacingMecha/godot-psx-style-demo

Software used: Godot 3.3, Blender 2.8, Audacity, Gimp, Dialogic Plugin for Godot.
